lender.occupational_info:
I try to tell stories that can move people into understanding something - truths - that they can't quite put into words, or haven't quite yet established in their thoughts.
If you have a story you'd like me to tell, please do share it! - andwarf @ hotmail.com .

lender.name: OFS3-Bubbah
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute to women’s empowerment and their independency. Gender inequalities in developing societies inhibit economic growth and development. By giving women access to working capital and training, a program like KIVA helps women’s productive capacity to alleviate poverty. Moreover, evidence suggests that participation in microfinance programs such as KIVA may give women the means to escape from abusive relationships or limit abuse in their relationships. Working Women’s Forum found that 40.9 percent of its members who had experienced domestic violence stopped it because of their personal empowerment. I start investing in our future through KIVA, by investing the money collected by Bubbah the monkey, for late entry class penalty fee in people management skills course OFS3-Schlumberger, Nov-08- Sugarland. You can do it too. It is so easy and rewarding.

lender.name: Missions Minded

lender.occupational_info:
I have a particular interest in the needs of widows, orphans and single women/ men with dependents.
I would like to work with other like minded people to pool funds and direct giving to people in Kericho and Ogembo, Kenya; some of the post-soviet states and/or South America. If you are interested in joining a team to fund projects in these areas please join KanadaKares4Kiva. Team members are also free to designate loans to any of their own areas of interest in keeping with Kiva's philosophy. I hope to see you soon!
For some of my other charitable interests please see

lender.name: merbo
lender.loan_because:
it's good to chip in, change a life, gamble on goodness, get the ball rolling…
After all, it IS the only safe bet and while twenty five clams doesn't mean much to some, to others it can literally mean everything.
My avatar is borrowed from the 20th Century American master photographer, W. Eugene Smith and his heirs who now hold the copyright.
It's the closing image from a most famous book representing the work of numerous photographers, from the landmark exhibition, 'Family of Man', produced not long after WWII. And this photograph, titled 'The Walk to Paradise Garden' (1946), depicting Mr. Smith's own precious children, seemed to me to be an ideal image to include here. My heartfelt thanks goes to Gene Smith, and to all who keep his spirit and his insight alive.
I believe it can be argued that all of us owe a huge debt to all those involved in the 'Family of Man' because that exhibition, and the publication of those images, marks a special moment when, with renewed vigor once again, we strove to look willfully beyond ourselves, with greater compassion, towards a greater world.
The quote associated with the photograph, the final thought closing the book, from St.-John Perse, reads,
'A world to be born under your footsteps…'
A little more detail on this inspiring photograph; an excerpt taken from a lecture titled LOVE, JUSTICE, SEX AND MONEY, Part II - being the keynote address in Ontario, by Terry Boyd and Joseph Dunlop-Addley, at the Kingston Men's Conference of October, 1995.
"… Eugene Smith was an American photographer, and a true mentor. He photographed the deplorable "living" conditions of Japanese POW's in American WWII concentration camps and thereby changed those conditions; he was the first American photojournalist to do a photo story foregrounding and celebrating the bravery of a black person, a nurse, and thereby challenge racism; he photographed the effects of mercury poisoning on the people in a poor fishing village in Minamata, Japan. Smith was a keen observer of the human condition - he called himself a "compassionate cynic."
Smith suffered serious war injuries when he was documenting WWII and thought that he might never make another photograph. Fortunately for us, he did. Here is what he said about the making of that photograph:
"Finally, I decided to try, but it was very difficult. My face was still pouring pus and it was draining into the camera and my nerves were… I was not only about to go through the ceiling but through the sky. I decided to try, anyway. I got the whole family out of the house, except my two children. Then, I took them for a walk. I wanted it to be a good picture, to contradict and contrast with my war pictures, the last photographs that I had taken. So I followed the children, and I saw them stepping into this space as they went along the path. I stopped and clumsily tried to focus, and as they stepped into the space, I made the photograph. I felt that it was fairly good.
[I entitled the photograph] 'The Walk to Paradise Garden.' Most people think it has a religious connotation, but it's as much a tribute to music as anything. There is an opera by Delius called A Village Romeo and Juliet, and one piece of the music is called 'The Walk to Paradise Garden.' I've left it with an ambiguous title so that anyone can take from it what they wish. But it's basically my tribute to music and to humanity, because I think it shows hope."…"
If you'd like to hear the music, this arrangement - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SVeaAhYluOc - by Beecham, of Frederick Delius' "Walk to the Paradise Garden," performed by the London Symphony Orchestra with Sir John Barbirolli, is certainly well worth a listen.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I know this will help bring financial security to families across the word. This is an opportunity to connect to other working women and help where I am able. I give all credit to God for he continues to bless me so I want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a RN on a Burn and Wound Unit. I help clients find holistic health and contentment.

lender.name: Al K
lender.loan_because: It's great way to support people trying to improve their lives and that of their families.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in my life with a wonderful wife and family, a job I love, and friends that I cherish. I hope by helping someone else that they may also be happy in their lives and family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a commercial fisherman who works mainly in Antarctic areas (very often in ice). I also have an involvement in fisheries science and management with a particular interest in high latitude (Antarctic) fisheries. I have worked at times in many of the southern hemisphere seas and have a particular desire to help others in the industry in all countries; particularly those who value what we have and desire to pass on the resource to future generations in a better state than it is now.

lender.name: Melissa & Mike
lender.loan_because: everyone can use a helping hand at one point or another. We know that there are people in the world that have life tougher than we do. We'd like to help eliminate the poverty and inequality.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of students age 8-9. I teach reading, math, and social studies. My husband is a geologist. He works with natural gas and oil exploration.

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people setting up & develop business to make a difference in the world, realise their dream and live better. Being entrepreneur is a wonderfull experience and a real challenge that often need external advise and/or help.
lender.occupational_info: I create innovative products and services in the telecom, Internet and entertainment industry by working with partners in an open and co-development framework.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people while giving them something that will better their future
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Augustana College in the United States. I am studying History, Philosophy, and Government here. I am currently studying abroad in Suva Fiji

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: it may help somebody.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a grade 4 teacher who believes everyone can help themselves with the right support and encouragement.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I do criminal defense work.

lender.name: Lisbeth and Roar
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can.

lender.name: LAURA
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and this is a wonderul way to reach out around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We take care of people that are dying and make sure they are comfortable and not alone.

lender.name: Jeroen
lender.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help produce clean, renewable electricity that doesn't require the burning of fuel

lender.name: Malin
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have the opportunity to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I translate books and other texts from languages such as English, Norwegian and Danish to my mother tongue Swedish.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I believe it can help people to realise their projects and improve their future.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to find new clients for my company, which is an advertising agency. I also volonteer to raise funds to rebuild a school in MALI, Africa

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: A free market only functions when individuals step up, take a risk and become entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Tom & Wendy
lender.occupation: Retired U.S. Navy Diver and an Office Manager
lender.loan_because: luckily, we are in the position to be able to help people that are less fortunate than ourselves. We think that lending to those who need a helping hand is the most expedient way to get clear cut results for positive change.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: When all peoples of the world take time to care for each other, then all people in the world will be cared for.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I have enough, it is time for me to give.
lender.occupational_info: I study Forestry. How trees grow, and how wildlife interact with the forest environment. How to harvest without doing damage to our forests.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: I offer support and counseling to children and families living with HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: Laury
lender.loan_because: Poverty is a riot of inconsistencies and mysterious shades of complexity. Empowerment shifts the playing field.

lender.name: BODIE
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe in direct, one-to-one, lending. My family gives me a clean, dry home to live in, they feed me well and they tell me I should help others lead a good life, too!
lender.occupational_info: My only job is to be a good dog and make people happy!

lender.name: Jimmie
lender.loan_because: Service Above Self
lender.occupational_info: I am a transition consultant working with individuals and non-profit organizations experiencing life and stage transitions. I am also a member and past President of the Rotary Club of Scotts Valley California.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that the opportunity for success should be extended to everyone, regardless of their nationality, race, religion, economic conditions or political constraints.
lender.occupational_info: I work to open up the world to all people. I am an ethicist because I believe it is my personal mission to awaken people's minds and hearts to our commonalities and our responsibilities to ourselves and to each other.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: it's a way to help someone get their business going. And a little goes a long way!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to offer people the opportunity to better themselves, to build a world for themselves.

lender.name: Kortne
lender.loan_because: Help is a very good thing.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: There are few other places where small things can make a big difference

lender.name: Lucia
lender.loan_because: De cada uno segun su capacidad. A cada uno segun su necesidad. Everyone should give if she/he can. Everyone should receive if she/he needs.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: What easier way is there to make a difference?

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: Tikkun Olam--my need to help repair the world
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to read and write about literature. I also direct a program to train students to become people who make a difference in the world

lender.name: JP
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals in an ethical and dignified manner.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and non-profits create and achieve their desired futures.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I love helping and empowering fellow entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I try to live by the words of an old Quaker saying. "I expect to pass through this world but once. Therefore, any good work, kindness, or service I can render to any person or animal, let me do it now. Let me not neglect or delay to do it, for I will not pass this way again."

lender.name: Philip, Lisa & Simon
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: We are retired other than a small Ebay business which we run from our home

lender.name: Gillis
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have an opportunity to work for a living.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director of a Dallas based law firm.

lender.name: Pourquoi Pas - Why Not
lender.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving, helping those who help themselves. C'est une donation magique qui va en se multipliant, pour aider ceux et celles qui s'aident.

lender.name: Tan
lender.loan_because:
I need a loan of $5,000 to save my business and also, to settle all my debt.
I see a potential in my business and i see some profit coming up while building my business.
I need time to build my business but currently i don't have enough money to continue on. Debt start stacking.
I hope to find someone reliable can lend a personal loan for me. I am willing to pay $200-$300 per month for i just need this sum of money for less than 6 mths.
My credit rate is considered good. I don't have any bad records. Thanks ..
lender.occupational_info: Internet Marketer

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: everyone should have access to loans regardless of where the live or to whom they are born.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop retail web sites.

lender.name: Rita V
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Personal Assistant

lender.name: Mads
lender.loan_because: I hope, the children will have a better life, if their parents get a little help.

lender.name: Ossai
lender.loan_because: Thanks for acceptance in kiva,i am a foriegn exchange trader who have undergone several training in the exchange market,i want to acquire a loan to fund my account so that i can make money and payback my laon in a space of two months.
lender.occupational_info: it's all about currency trading,it is the best i ahve seen work from your home and pick up money whenever u one to,the liquidity is something else and the leverage is some to shout about,i love foreign exchange

lender.name: Patrick Stahl
lender.loan_because:
Because I believe the entrepreneurial spirit is precious and important to nourish.
And because we all need to give a damn, rather than just money.

lender.name: Jan-Willem Rodenhuis
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people directly, enabling them to improve their own lives and businesses
lender.occupational_info: I work at enabling organisations to make better use of their IT

lender.name: JAMES
lender.loan_because: simply it is the right thing to do. It helps our world generate the necessary outcome through helping one another succeed. Through this program I am able to help out in our community as well.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer my own time making candles on my own so that I can provide fundraising event for schools and other military organizations that need help on their own.

lender.name: Enterprise-IT-Security.com
lender.loan_because: The world needs security not only in IT.
lender.occupational_info: IT Security Company

lender.name: Colette
lender.loan_because: J'ai connu Kiva par un article du journal Le Monde du 7 nov 08 signé Caroline Fourest.

lender.name: Jani
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I make new medicines for sick people.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I care about people and I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: It's the coolest way I can think of to make a difference in a sustainable way.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I am eager to give some help where it is needed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach philosophy at a great university -- the University of Michigan.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I like this savvy system to give directly to local entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to perform better

lender.name: K.N.A.P.
lender.loan_because: We loan as a family to teach our kids the importance of charity and the impact it can have on those in need.

lender.name: Frode Lindtner
lender.loan_because: I hope to help
lender.occupational_info: websites development with microsoft tools

lender.name: Ric
lender.loan_because: people with dreams should be helped. And I'm in a position where I can do just that.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to help end poverty in the world
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher of writing, a poet and editor.

lender.name: Natalia
lender.loan_because: I believe in changing the world through small deeds with concrete impact, and microcredit is a powerful tool for that.
lender.occupational_info: I do research in Computational Linguistics and Natural Language Processing. Basically that means I spend most of my day trying to get a computer to understand what written texts mean. : )

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I have been inspired by Barack Obama and I have decided to be a better citizen of the world and try help others. If we all did a little bit more for our "world neighbors" in need, this will be a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family, our house and our finances.
